result.content:
Flame Lions

  • Smaller gang in Bridgetown
  • Only control the Pride Ward of Bridgetown
  • Members can identified by some sort of red clothing around there neck, either a collar, scarf, or bandanna.
  • Lead by Dr Nero Madarra
  • Other key members include
    • Rita 'Iceman' Cuffe
    • Bobby 'Revolvers' Snowden
